subtitle: Use Arborio rice if you have it in this versatile recipe.

method.text: Heat the oil in a large pan. Fry the mushrooms over a high heat for 2 min or until golden. Add the onions and garlic and fry for 2 min. Then stir in the rice and stock. Bring to the boil, season and simmer for 10 min, stirring regularly.
Add the courgette slices and continue to cook for 10 min or until the stock has been absorbed. Stir in the almonds. Serve sprinkled with freshly shredded basil.

title: Courgette and almond risotto
